name: Cloud STRAFE
description:
You're a cool cloud.
Your goal is to create trees, make nature real nice and green. 
You grow trees by pouring rain on the ground.

You can eat smaller clouds, which makes you bigger.
Which makes you rain harder and harder.

But it also makes it harder for you to avoid huge clouds.
Which eat you up.

There's factories.
Trees don't grow around factories.
The areas where trees die slowly grows larger. 

You can destroy the factories, by eating their electo-clouds. 
But that creates forest fires. Which spread.

Your goal is to mame most of the world green.
By growing a sweet ass forest.
